publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1294 Brian Adam: Loud Tie Day—That the Parliament congratulates and supports the organisers of ‘Loud Tie Day’, which is to be held on Friday 3 November 2000, in their bid to raise awareness of bowel cancer.
S1M-1294 Loud Tie Day (lodged on 30 October 2000) Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-1294 Loud Tie Day (lodged on 30 October 2000) Fiona McLeod*

S1M-1294 Brian Adam: Loud Tie Day—That the Parliament congratulates and supports the organisers of ‘Loud Tie Day’, which is to be held on Friday 3 November 2000, in their bid to raise awareness of bowel cancer. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson, Fiona McLeod
S1M-1294 Loud Tie Day (lodged on 30 October 2000) Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Tricia Marwick*
S1M-1294 Loud Tie Day (lodged on 30 October 2000) Christine Grahame*, Ms Sandra White*, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*

S1M-1294 Brian Adam: Loud Tie Day-That the Parliament congratulates and supports the organisers of 'Loud Tie Day', which is to be held on Friday 3 November 2000, in their bid to raise awareness of bowel cancer. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson, Fiona McLeod, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Adam Ingram, Tricia Marwick, Christine Grahame, Ms Sandra White, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh
S1M-1294 Loud Tie Day (lodged on 30 October 2000) Andrew Wilson*

S1M-1294 Brian Adam: Loud Tie Day-That the Parliament congratulates and supports the organisers of 'Loud Tie Day', which is to be held on Friday 3 November 2000, in their bid to raise awareness of bowel cancer. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson, Fiona McLeod, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Adam Ingram, Tricia Marwick, Christine Grahame, Ms Sandra White, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, Andrew Wilson

S1M-1294 Brian Adam: Loud Tie Day—That the Parliament congratulates and supports the organisers of ‘Loud Tie Day’, which is to be held on Friday 3 November 2000, in their bid to raise awareness of bowel cancer.
